Name: Hay Day Farm 2019 - 卡通农场
About the game: Build your dream Farm! Harvest crops, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with distant islands. Open restaurants, cinemas and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world. Are you ready to build your dream? Let’s get started! Township features: ● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town ● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories ● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill ● Exotic goods brought from the islands ● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals ● Famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!
